Articles.Content:
Well after a month of play I finally got around to making my first Space Plane.

http://i.imgur.com/N771Sux.png?1

Oseralis Space Industries designed the OSI Tempest MK I originally for long range kethane surveys around Kerbin. After a few altitude tests it was pretty obvious the framework was in place achieving orbit. It sits at a comfy 128 parts and even with damaged wing tips it can fly in a stable pattern.

Id really enjoy some input on the basic frame.
